name: prelude-wp
description: Prelude is a Wordpress starter theme that helps you craft custom themes. It uses Gulp to compile and minify scss/css, concatenate and minify JS, compress images, and more.

scripts.test: echo "Error: no test specified doggie" && exit 1
scripts.postinstall: echo "Thank you for installing Prelude!" && rsync -a -v --ignore-existing gulpfile.js ./../../ && rsync -a -v --ignore-existing src/* ./../../ && echo "Go make rad stuff!"

author: Factor1 Studios <http://factor1studios.com>
